Docs.summary: Specifies the gridline styles for controls that display items in a table structure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines> enumeration represents the different gridline styles for controls that display items in a table structure. You can display the horizontal, the vertical, both the horizontal and vertical, or no grid lines.
